You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Music
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: One and a half year
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PhD
OTHER-SKILLS: Painting
AVAILABILITY: Last week of January

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Ok.
RECRUITER: Please tell me what other skills you have.
ANSWER: I also have skills in painting.
RECRUITER: For how long have you been working in the industry?
ANSWER: I have one and a half years of industry experience.
RECRUITER: What is your lastest education degree?
ANSWER: My latest education degree is a PhD.
RECRUITER: Please tell me when you could start working for us.
ANSWER: I am available to start in the last week of January.
RECRUITER: What was your bachelor course?
ANSWER: My bachelor course was in Music.
ME:  Has the recruiter been informed about the field of your bachelor? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
